programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 350
programme.desc: Rosnani has trouble accepting that things are well and truly over between Louis and her. Meanwhile, Louis is upset that James has been doing so well in his absence and decides to exact revenge.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - The Food That Made Me - EP 39
programme.desc: Chef Bob prides himself as a champion of traditional Malay food. But when his rendang doesn't meet his mum's expectations, he heads on a culinary journey to discover the history of his cuisine. Our food tells us incredible stories of how we lived, fought and survived. Join 5 personalities as they embark on a journey to discover their past through the traditional food that they loved.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 110
programme.desc: Ellen welcomes Kristen Bell (Baby line "Hello Bello").

programme.title: NCIS 14 - EP 4
programme.desc: Gibbs, Quinn and Palmer travel out to sea and board a destroyer after the body of a navy lieutenant is discovered during a tiger cruise, when civilian guests are allowed to spend the night on the ship. Meanwhile, McGee contemplates the perfect proposal for Delilah Fielding.

programme.title: Tricked (Canada) - EP 3
programme.desc: Tricked Canada is a high-energy family series that pulls the rabbit out of the hat and flips it on its ear. It drags magic off the stage and onto the streets as master magician Eric LeClerc goes undercover with hidden cameras, posing in a variety of guises such as store clerk, waiter or sales assistant to pull super sneaky pranks on unsuspecting people.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 163
programme.desc: Iced coffee may not be healthier and less caloric than soda; the new cold brew that is a zero-calorie beverage; rapper Fat Joe tells what led him to drop 100 pounds and change his excessive hip-hop lifestyle.

programme.title: Jack S1 - EP 0025 & 0026
programme.desc: Jack is a human-like terrestrial from Beano, a small asteroid that orbits the earth. Unbeknownst to all parents on Earth, he tunes in with CHIP's help to search for and monitor little mysteries for Earth's children. Aided by the "Outer-Net", Jack with his 2 sidekicks - CHIP and Rocket, the goofy little dog, embark on numerous adventures to unravel those mysteries.

programme.title: Geronimo Stilton S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: When Pandora's pet hamster "Mr. Nibbles" runs off, it leads her and Benjamin to the long forgotten Whiskerfur Castle, where ghostly specters can be seen and creepy sounds heard. Our heroes search the estate and find more than just a little hamster hidden inside.

A surprised Guo En kissed her. Zhiyi is very affected after seeing this clip on the net. (重)国恩在电话里向敏妃告白，却听到砰的一声！他吓得奔跑到敏妃家附近，看到敏妃的车撞上了大树。敏妃无恙地出现，惊喜的国恩马上抱着她热吻。芝仪无意间看到网络上两人热吻的录像，深受打击。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 343
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Yi Yang tries to prove to Wen Liang that Chen Xi is a materialistic girl. He purposely tries to get close to her with the intention of tricking her. Chen Xi sees through his plans but pretends not to and plays along. Yi Yang feels proud, but Wen Liang continues to believe that Chen Xi is not a materialistic girl. Yi Yang asks Chen Xi out to a pub; assuming that Chen Xi has fallen for him and tries to kiss her. But he is kicked by Chen Xi ruthlessly. (PG)(重)一阳为了向文良证明晨曦是个拜金女，故意向她示好，要引她上钩。晨曦看穿他的意图，假装配合。一阳得意洋洋，文良却认为晨曦不是这样的女孩子。一阳约晨曦到酒廊，以为晨曦已经上钩，借机要吻她，却被晨曦狠狠踹了一脚。.

programme.desc: Host Jason Yeoh explores food markets and street stalls around Malaysia and delves into the human tales and history behind each tasty bite. 跟随阿贤的脚步逛巴刹，在老味道裡追寻新的生命力。节目将纪录全马各地巴刹的老滋味，以感受劳动民众一天最早甦醒的好食光。.

programme.title: 爱...没有距离 Loving You - EP 1
programme.desc: Lin Li, a creative director at a beauty company, is often seen as a strong-willed career woman but she does have a vulnerable side. She strives hard for her work and family but one day, her boss unexpectedly decides to engage a young Internet celebrity to compete with her. Lin Li is soon dealt with another blow when she discovers that her husband Chen Shi has an extramarital affair. (PG)(首播)为人干练的林俐是一家连锁化妆品公司的创意总监，外表女强人气势的她，内心却有柔软的一面。为了工作和家庭，她鞠躬尽瘁，谁知上司竟从国外聘请了年轻网红，与她竞争。更甚的是，她竟在此时发现丈夫陈石有了外遇！.

Then, his friend Tang Sen (Leon Lee) invites him to return to the field and help out their newly established "Criminal Psychology Team X". programme.desc: As our population ages & lifestyle changes, more people are suffering from the three highs. Which folk remedies are effective in preventing & fighting against the three highs? 随着人口老化及生活方式改变越来越多人患上三高：高血压、高血糖和高血脂会提高罹患心血管疾病和中风的机率。预防三高、对抗三高成为人们控管健康的重点。民间流传各式降三高的偏方，哪些真有辅助效用？.

programme.title: 健康密码 第二季 Health Code S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Hosted by Boey Leung & doctor writer Ouyang Lin, this brand new season sees medical specialists talking about illnesses that affect your daily life. 知名医生作家欧阳林搭档梁宝仪主持的全新医疗保健节目，邀请专科医生解开疾病迷思，同时有营养师分享正确饮食观，让你轻松在生活中掌握健康密码。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 50
programme.desc: Jin Guangyao received his due punishment. Wei Wuxian bade farewell to Lan Zhan and embarked on his new journey. Nie Huaisang is firmly in control. (PG13-暴力镜头)(大结局)金光瑶得到惩罚。 魏无羡辞别蓝湛踏上云游之路。聂怀桑操控一切 风波平息天下太平.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 275
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 新马美食一家亲 Makan Unlimited - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Food travelogue that explores the similarities and differences between the common foods in Singapore and Malaysia. (重)海南鸡饭、肉骨茶、叻沙等等都是大家熟悉不过的南洋美食，尤以新加坡和马来西亚最为普及，也深受新马人民的喜爱，早已成为两地人民生活的一部分。主持人王禄江将走访两地带观众们看看同一道美食之间的不同。.

programme.title: BENGpire 黑黑 真好玩 BENGpire - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) When one mentions Japan, most people would think of hot springs, ramen and cute girls. In this episode, BENGpire will try out traditional Japanese hot springs, luxurious lobster ramen and even date a cute Japanese girl! They would share about their ideal types as well as views on relationships. (重).

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 45
programme.desc: (R) Frontline is a weekly investigative current affairs programme that aims to address issues closest to the hearts of Singaporeans. (重)民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 爱...没有距离 Loving You - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Lin Li's daughter Si Yuan finds out that her father is having an affair with tuition teacher Yu Ting. Unable to forgive her father, Si Yuan wrecks Yu Ting's laptop. Lin Li presses Chen Shi, he tells her it has nothing to do with Yu Ting and that their marriage had problems since long ago. Lin Li goes to the playground; Dong Sheng recognises her as the big sister who helped him when he was a kid... (PG)(重)林俐的女儿思远发现父亲与自己的老师玉婷有婚外情，无法原谅父亲，怒摔玉婷的笔电发泄。林俐质问陈石，陈石指此事和玉婷无关，他们夫妻间早就出现了问题。林俐到游乐场疗伤，外卖员东升认出她是小时候帮过自己的姐姐……。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 38
programme.desc: (R)(Part 1) Yongzheng remains in coma. Liying lashes out at Chengfeng for carrying on with the bidding. She lets on the reason why Yongzheng hates gambling. Weijia attempts to dissuade Chengfeng from going ahead with his plan, but is met with stubborn refusal. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(第38集上)永正昏迷，乘风前往医院探望；丽荧责骂乘风为何要坚持竞逐赌牌，然后告知众人永正讨厌赌博的原因。围家再劝乘风放弃赌牌，乘风为达目标坚决不肯。 (38B)家昌旺召开股东会议，投票罢免乘风。乘风被罢免下台，雅顿担心乘风的假账会被揭发而连累他入狱。.

programme.title: 家和万事兴 Lee's Family Reunion - EP 206
programme.desc: (R) Passed down from generation to generation, the Li Ji Cake Shop has a hundred-year history to boast about. However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 88
programme.desc: (R) Ke Ai becomes the spokesperson for 'May Phua' group. Upon realizing that it was Boris's mother who sought Ke Ai out for this role, Shun Shui accuses Boris of pulling the strings from behind. (PG)(重)可爱当上第一女主角的消息没有获得证实，但已肯定为May Phua集团代言。顺水一听是Boris的母亲找可爱当代言，马上联想到是Boris拉的线，可爱否认。顺水因Boris不断以实际行动支持可爱的事业，自己却毫无作为，不禁闷闷不乐。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 170
programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) The news of Ah Mans illness spread, and many of his celebrity customers move to other hairstylists. Star Salons business suffers as a result. Xiao Xiao feels guilty and is scolded by Ah Man. Moon hopes that Xiao Xiao will leave, but Xiao Xiao vows to stay by her mentors side no matter what. (PG)(重)阿满患绝症的消息传开后，以往奉承他的艺人明星们纷纷转投其他发型师，使得Star发廊的生意大受影响。小小感愧疚，更经常受到阿满的斥骂。Moon希望小小能因此离开，但小小顾念阿满栽培的恩情，表示不管师傅怎么对她，她也不会走。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Minfei received confirmation that her illness is terminal and falls into depression. Dewei consoles her and encourages her to go for treatment, Minfei however thinks it is useless to seek treatment as her condition is already terminal. Dewei is heartbroken when Minfei breaks down and he embraces her. Qingmei witness the entire scene. (重)敏妃证实患上先天免疫系统绝症，陷入绝望之中。德伟安慰敏妃，并鼓励她接受治疗。敏妃认为就算接受治疗，下场还是一样。她深感生命的脆弱，不禁哭成泪人。德伟心痛地把她抱入怀中，被清梅目睹。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Chen Xi agrees to be Wen Liang's girlfriend but Yi Yang is strongly against it. Wen Liang and Zhong Da partner together for a tour bus business and the business is going smooth. At a celebratory event, Wen Liang brings Chen Xi along to attend the event. Zhong Da is burning with fury as he notices the intimate interactions between the couple and vows to avenge his sister, Jie Yu. (PG)(重)晨曦答应当文良的女朋友，一阳反应激烈，大表反对。文良和仲达合作接送旅客的生意进展顺利，庆祝会上，文良带晨曦出席。仲达看着两人亲密的互动，怒火中烧，誓言要替妹妹婕妤报复文良……。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 38
programme.desc: (Part 2) Jia Chang Wang's shareholders call for a meeting to vote for the removal of Chengfeng from office. Chengfeng is deposed. Yadun is worried that he will be implicated by Chengfeng's forging of accounts. (PG)(第38集下)家昌旺召开股东会议，投票罢免乘风。乘风被罢免下台，雅顿担心乘风的假账会被揭发而连累他入狱。.

programme.title: A Taste of Festival - EP 11
programme.desc: The Mid-Autumn Festival is a day of family reunion. Besides introducing the making of Cantonese, Teochew & Hainanese moon cakes, the host also invites restaurant chef to share the cooking methods of hairy crabs. Chef Jeremy also demonstrates to cook two creative & tasty Mid-Autumn Festival dishes. 中秋节，是团圆的日子。主持人除了介绍广式莲蓉月饼、潮州酥皮芋泥月饼和海南盐酥饼的做法之外，也请来餐馆厨师分享大闸蟹的烹调方法。厨师詹伟健则示范烹煮两道中秋创意美食。.

programme.title: 爱...没有距离 Loving You - EP 3
programme.desc: Si Yuan runs away from home, seeking refuge at fellow netizen Dong Sheng's friend's home. Chen Shi and Lin Li goes to places frequented by Si Yuan but they can't find her. Chen Shi recalls that Si Yuan actively participates in a group that investigates the paranormal and thinks she may be with them. Lin Li is furious that Chen Shi secretly allowed Si Yuan to make friends online. (PG)思远离家出走，与网友东升暂住东升朋友家。陈石和林俐到思远常去的地方，都找不到她。陈石想起思远参加“真相探究”的事，猜想她或许和网友在一起。林俐这才知道陈石瞒着她让思远结交网友，气得和陈石大吵一架。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 1 Garden Of Treasure S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper II - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Macau tycoon Gao Tianjiu forces his business partners to rent the shops in his hotel; he reserves two units for Luo Weixin but the latter did not turn up and instead fetches his elder brother, Qiao Tianshen from the airport. Tianjiu's son, Xianbo, was involved in a hit and run accident with a taxi, witnessed by Yao Wenying. (PG13-毒品相关内容)(重)澳门名人高天鹫借机展示他在黑沙湾兴建的酒店，更邀请各界商人向他们施压租铺，他也预留两个铺位给罗威信可是后者却没出席，而往机场接兄长乔天生。天鹫之子先柏驾车与的士相撞后，逃离现场，被姚文英目睹一切。.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 18

Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 加油！向未来 Eureka Moment China - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) "Eureka Moment China" is an explosive and larger than life gameshow in which two couples go head to head testing their knowledge and coming face to face with a raft of dangerous stunts and wacky experiments. (重)《加油！向未来》是中央电视台推出的科学实验节目，由央视创造传媒有限公司制作。节目共11期，由撒贝宁、张腾岳主持，邓楚涵为解题人。每期节目明星将和观众代表一起，通过实验竞赛，为加油队和未来队赢取科学奖励，获胜队将赢得当期最终大奖（北极圈科考之旅）。.

programme.title: 30分钟煮一餐 Quick Cuisine - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Career is still pretty much a dominant part of Singaporeans' lives. As such, most Singaporeans resort to eating out rather than going home to enjoy a sumptuous home-cooked meal. Working mothers always aspire to let their children and family enjoy a nutritious home-cooked meal. Hence, Quick Cuisine offers to inform all on how to prepare a meal in 30 minutes or less. (重)人们经常在外用餐，其实心里都非常渴望吃家常菜，尤其是忙碌的职业妇女虽然有女佣代劳，难得下厨，不过她们其实也很希望在特别的日子里，为家人和孩子准备美食。因此，为忙碌的专业和工作人士提供容易处理而且又营养丰富的食谱和烹饪秘诀，将会广受欢迎。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 11
programme.desc: Hulk makes a surprise appearance to meet Pepper and confesses that he hasn't gotten over her at all. Hulk finally learns that he truly wants Pepper back into his life and he has even broken up with Officer Xinyi to prove he is serious about it. Pepper is at a lost and isn't sure if she should accept him back. Back in camp, Pepper and her platoon mates are getting ready to take their SIT test which will determine if they are fit to go into Officer Cadet School. Hulk跟Pepper道歉，并坦言自己心里还是无法忘记Pepper，所以跟何欣怡分手了，并希望Pepper可以接受自己。Pepper一时矛盾，无法回答。回到军营后，她和其他女兵必须准备Sit Test，却没想到Sit Test的考官就是何欣怡。.

programme.title: As Long As You Live S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. (重)(最后一集)全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 8
programme.desc: In 2013, a trip to build water supply systems in Sarawak's rural farming areas became a life-changing opportunity for four youngsters. Motivated to help these communities overcome their economic hardships, they set up Langit Collective, a social enterprise to help farmers here to sell their crops. 四名转换人生跑道的年轻人，2013年随非政府组织来到马来西亚砂拉越偏乡建设供水系统，同时也看见了偏乡以种植稻 米维生的农民，所面临的经济困境。于是他们共同创办了社会企业，要协助农民卖米，翻转偏乡山区的经济，增加农民的收入。.

programme.title: 甜蜜和风味 Sweet Tales From Tokyo - EP 4
programme.desc: A travelogue featuring all sweet treats Japanese! (重).

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 23
programme.desc: Ep 23: Yalan plans to lure Jin Longjia with an attractive contract and then applies for patent secretly once Jin comes up with a new type of wine successfully. Jin feels insulted by Yalan's lack of sincerity. Ep 23: 雅兰计划以优厚的条件吸引金龙甲到丰吉堂传授独家的酿酒秘方后然后背着金龙甲去申请专利。雅兰只知道用钱跟金老师交换他的技术，根本没有诚意。金老师看到雅兰带来的合约觉得受辱。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 24
programme.desc: Ep 24: Jin Longjia agrees to return to Pung Gil Dong on the condition that Wu Chun assists him in the wine-brewing process. Malu and Wu Chun feel uneasy in each other's presence when they find out that Yong Hao's death was indirectly caused by Xianshu. Ep 24: 金龙甲被吴春的诚意打动，答应到丰吉堂的卖场酿酒，条件是要吴春当他的助理。马陆和吴春同时发现永浩当初是为了救贤淑才冤死的。马陆和吴春突然间觉得尴尬。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 18
programme.desc: Ep 21Haiqing looks for Dehao as she is upset that the Jinshan Law Firm is going to be investigated and searched by the procuratorate. Dehao had long known Chairman Zheng's secret fund is related to the Jinshan Law Firm. Dehao meets Yingyi in the procuratorate and knowing that he has to deal with Yingyi who once groomed him, he is emotionally torn.Ep 22The crafty Yingyi wants Dehao to sort out the accounts books of Chairman Zheng's secret fund before he stops the search of the Jinshan Law Ep 21 海卿因烦恼金山法律事务所将开始被检察厅调查与搜索的事而去找德浩。德浩早料到了郑会长的秘密资金与事务所有关连。德浩在检察厅见到瑛溢，一想到要与曾提拔他的瑛溢对峙，不禁感慨万分。Ep22狡猾的瑛溢要信佑整理好郑会长的秘密个人户头资金账簿后，才停止对金山律师事务所的搜查和释放海卿。志旭去检查室消毁了父亲瑛溢与郑会长商谈秘密资金的交易录音记录。.

programme.title: 百变达人 Beyond Show - EP 1
programme.desc: An entertaining talent competition with participants from Japan, Italy, China etc. The judges are Wilber Pan, Patty Hou, Li Bo and Liu Yuning. 《百变达人》集结了导播、灯光、舞美、视觉、置景、秀导团队，百人共创。以独特的创意呈现，将不同的表演形式，通过创意的、科技的、艺术的加工。.

programme.title: 反斗红星去打工 - 印度篇 All Work No Pay Holidays - India - EP 5
programme.desc: Watch Ben Yuan and Mat Yeung experience all work no pay holiday working as a lunch deliveryman, laundry washer, driver, desert cleaner and a kindergarten teacher in India. 一连五集，袁伟豪、杨明以真人骚形式，在印度体验五份极具地道特色的工作。送饭、洗衫、做打杂看似小儿科，可是在摄氏五十度的高温、贫民窟一样的严酷环境工作，又是另一番滋味。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 15
programme.desc: Ep 21Xu Ren knows that Director Ma Shengtai is behind the framing of grandpa Qianshu. To clear grandpa Qianshu's name, Xu Ren put on a business suit to visit Ma Shengtai.Ep 22Xiaolian's condition gradually improve under Xu Ren's careful counselling and treatment. Xiaolian pledges to be a doctor when she grows up to treat poor patients like her. Xu Ren feels pleased about it. Ep 21许任知道千述爷爷被关进警局是马圣泰院长暗中搞鬼陷害的。为了给爷爷一个清白，许任换上了一身西装去找马圣泰院长。Ep 22小莲的病经过许任用心的开导和治疗后逐渐好转。小莲立志长大后要成为一名医生，替像她一样的穷苦病人治疗，令许任感到十分欣慰。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 20On the first year of Liu Shizhen's passing, Jiang Muyan went to the desert to remember Liu and say goodbye. Suddenly Jiang heard Liu's voice on the walkie-talkie! Ep 21Yin Mingzhu and Xu Daying reconciled and Mingzhu's father also accepted Xu as his son-in-law. Jiang Muyan came to a realisation that she and Liu Shizhen were both u 第20集刘时镇去世一周年，姜暮研到沙漠向刘时镇告别，此时呼叫机突然传来刘时镇的声音！原来刘时镇与徐大英被民兵队关押了数十月，幸好被提安搭救。大伙得知两人死而复生都喜出望外。第21集尹明珠与徐大英和好如初，明珠的父亲也认可徐大英成为自己的女婿。姜暮研意识到自己与刘时镇都是为了维护和平而努力。两人重回乌鲁克的海滩，奠定了对彼此的感情。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Puzzle Masters is the ultimate competition for any young undiscovered puzzle wizards who are looking for a challenge and want to be mentored by the best Puzzle Masters the world has to offer. It scours the nation to find the cleverest, smartest, most complete puzzle solvers. 100 budding apprentices are invited to take part in the competition, and faces tough tests in 6 categories: inductive reasoning, calculation, observation, memorization, spatial thinking, and creativity. (重)江苏卫视推出的一档大型脑力偶像竞技真人秀，由王峰、王昱珩、鲍橒担任队长，刘国梁担任战术指导，陶晶莹担任常驻嘉宾，每期还有特邀明星嘉宾的加入。第一轮挑战就是晋级30强的百人淘汰赛，一百位选手同台比赛，最终只有30人成功晋级挑战赛，其余选手全部淘汰出局。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore Sr 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Peifen tries to figure out how in the world her favourite snacks can taste like something without the natural ingredients so she heads to the secret labs of the IFF to find out how flavour and fragrances are conjured out of thin air. Also, she tries to uncover the confidential methods of making Hashima at the Jurong Frog Farm. (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S9 - EP 13
programme.desc: This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 6
programme.desc: Even with a Master's degree, Taiwanese graduates struggle with low starting pay with some forced to look for brighter prospects in a night market stall. For a working single mother to own a piece of property, taking on 3 jobs makes barely enough to pay for hefty housing loan. And even into his seventies, an elderly part time worker struggles with high tuition and pricey private school fees to enable his teenage daughter to compete effectively. 硕士毕业生面对学历贬值、薪水低的‘闷世代'，选择在夜市摆摊。单亲妈妈身兼三职， 只为供房、供女儿念大学。72岁的资深编辑老来被迫接受低薪来养家。一起进入台北打工仔的生活， 了解他们辛勤工作的动力。.

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 7
programme.desc: Among the four styles of cooking that make up Kyoto's cuisine, obanzai or traditional cooking is the least known. Aun discovers that even as some of their dishes are served at restaurants and sold at stores, Kyoto residents are losing the knowledge and skill to cook what they call soul foods. 京都料理“Obanzai”是传统烹饪手法中最鲜为人知的。它是京都人的家传美食，简单却极具风韵。但美食博客许安却发现虽然传统菜肴都很家常，京都人其实缺乏一些相关知识与手法来烹饪出他们所谓的“灵魂料理”。.

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 7
programme.desc: Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. 洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 25
programme.desc: Ep 25: Malu does not know how to face Wu Chun when he is told that Xianshu's insistence on finishing the project quickly had led to the fatal accident. Yalan tries to claim credit for Jin's return to the company. She is embarrassed when Jin says in Juxi's presence that he had returned because of Wu Chun. Ep 25: 马陆在听说当初是母亲催促工人们赶工才出意外的，不知如何面对吴春。雅兰一直要为金老师到卖场酿酒的事抢功劳，但金老师却在菊熙面前直说他是因为欣赏吴春所以才回到丰吉堂的，令雅兰很尴尬。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 26
programme.desc: Ep 26: Malu cannot bear to leave Wu Chun behind. He decides not to go to the U.S. and also tells Wu Chun about his feelings for her. Wu Chun discovers that she was adopted when she goes through Yong Hao's diary. Ep 26: 马陆舍不得吴春，不但决定不去美国，还折返卖场向吴春表白。吴春看到永浩日记里的内容，终于发现自己是被领养的。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 19
programme.desc: Ep 23Dehao tells Zhixu that Yingyi is involved in Chairman Zheng's bribery case and has used the accounts of his ex-body guard, chauffeur and domestic helper for transactions. Zhixu asks for evidence angrily. Zhixu feels ashamedEp 24Dehao finds out that the prosecutors are celebrating Yingyi's promotion to Attorney-General in advance. He gate-crashes the event and spoils the day for Yingyi. Yingyi orders the prosecutors to arrest all personnel related to Dehao at his law firm as revenge. Ep 23德浩约志旭见面，告知其父瑛溢牵涉郑会长的贿赂事件，指瑛溢用了他前护卫、司机和帮佣的人头账户过账。志旭生气地要德浩拿出证据。其后，志旭从帮佣那儿听说父亲的所作所为，感到很羞愧。 Ep 24德浩得知众检察官在餐馆预先为瑛溢庆祝荣升检察总长的消息后，特地去那儿砸场。之后，瑛溢生气地命检察官们去德浩的事务所逮捕了与德浩相关的人，以向德浩报复。.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 6
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 23Xu Ren worries about war torn Korea and decides to go back there to save those people in need. Yanjing is very upset when she find out about it. She decides to spend more time with Xu Ren to give him the best memories. Ep 24A medicine rack in the pharmacy topples suddenly. Xu Ren gets knocked out when he tries to protect Mujie. He is back in Seoul when he wakes up again. The hapless Mujie is also brought back to modern Korea... Ep 23许任挂念着战乱的朝鲜，决定回到那儿去救治那些需要帮助的百姓们。妍京知道后十分伤心。她决定在剩下的时间好好陪伴许任，让他留下最美好的回忆。Ep 24药房的药架子突然倒了下来。许任为了护住幕介，结果被砸晕了。当他再次醒来的时候，已经来到了首尔。可怜的幕介也莫名其妙地来到了韩国......

programme.title: 民族味 National Flavours - EP 1
programme.desc: What're the origins of Tapas? Traditional Spanish cuisine borrows heavily from early colonial masters - the Moors. Pork is shunned as Islam rules. How did modern Spaniards acquire their obsession for pork and ham? programme.title: 金星火星大不同 2 Mars Vs Venus 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: It is essential for couples to stay together in blessings and woes! However is it true that women will abandon the men if there is a disaster in their marriage? How will the women from the Venus team argue on this or are they really like this in real life? programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 2
programme.desc: Ep 2: Na-yan refuses to go to a children's home. Jingwan thus decides to bring her home. Shizhen is jealous when she feels that Na-yan has robbed her of Jingwan's love. Ep 2: 敬莞发现娜妍不肯跟社工去育幼院，于是决定把娜妍接回家。世珍看见敬莞送同样款式的手表给她和娜妍，后来又看到敬莞拥抱娜妍，觉得娜妍抢走敬莞一半的爱，非常不开心。.

programme.title: 超完美秘书 Jugglers - EP 14

Yunli is sad and disappointed with Baona. To protect Yunli from the cohabitation rumours spreading in the company, Zhiyuan decides to move out to st Ep 17允利发现公司公告栏里的最新消息有她和南致原出双入对的照片，让她十分担心。她怀疑是尚武在她的部门安插了眼线。Ep 18允利万万没想到宝娜为了升职，背叛了友谊，出卖她，帮尚武找出致原与她谈办公室恋情的证据。允利对宝娜感到很失望和伤心。由于致原担心公司散播他与允利同居的谣言会伤害允利，决定先搬去与皇甫律家住。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 99
programme.desc: Ep 67:Xixun found Junxiang's phone number in Jiang Bidong's pocket and deduces that Junxiang is Jiang Xinyu. Xixun tails Jiang Bidong and found him apologizing to Junxiang for not being a good father. Xixun advises Jiang Bidong to return to the hospital. Ep 67:锡勋在江必东口袋里找到俊相的电话号码，确定俊相是江信宇。锡勋看到江信宇向俊相道歉说自己不是个好爸爸。锡勋劝江信宇回医院接受治疗。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 68
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Knowing that Xixun and Xuehua are getting married soon, Lanxue wants to do something for Xuehua even though she should not let others know that she is her biological mother. At a bridal shop, Lanxue could not takes her eyes off Xuehua trying a wedding gown. She secretly takes her photo. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)得知锡勋与雪花将要结婚，兰雪想为雪花做些事但不想被外人知道她是雪花的亲生母亲。当雪花试穿礼服时，兰雪对雪花目不转睛，还偷偷拿了她的照片。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 12
programme.desc: After the events of the previous episode, the girls of Pegasus company witness a helpless girl being kidnapped and forced into a run-away van. After giving chase and rescuing the girl, Pepper and her sisters learn that she's actually an illegal sex worker. She pleads for Pepper not to make a police report as she will be apprehended as well. After interrogating the girl's captor, Pepper comes to the shocking discovery that there is another girl being captured and locked away. Pepper和女兵们追逐那辆货车，但货车很快就离去了。她们立刻报警，警方也立刻展开搜索，并表示一有进展就通知她们。Pepper和小欣等回家，路上却一直想着刚才发生的事情。这时他们经过那辆货车，没想到那辆货车就停泊在马路旁。一名男子走了出来，要把货车开走。十万火急，Pepper等最后降服了那名男子，并拯救了在酒店受困的女子。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S2 As Long As You Live S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: "As Long As You Live II" continues to explore and understand how seniors are treated and what are the available options for seniors in countries like Netherlands, Switzerland, Germany, Canada and the USA. 全球人口老化，人生下半场越来越长，第二辑《长命百二岁》进军欧美，引领观众用新思维面对「老」问题。 「百二岁」参观荷兰的「失智村」和德国的「幽灵巴士站」，了解照顾认知障碍长者的窍门。节目去瑞士取经，探讨近年兴起的「时间银行」概念，透过服务长者换取老来有人照顾自己。采访队又帶大家窥探美国「冷冻人」的奥秘。.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 22
programme.desc: Ep 25: Enlan wants to get rid of both Youbin and Shan'ni. She instructs Youbin to elope with Shan'ni and also does damage to Youbin's car. Just as Enlan assumes that both of them have died in a car accident, Youbin and Shan'ni appears before Enlan and the press and expose Enlan's hideous intentions.Ep 26: Shan'ni obtains evidence of the illicit relationship between the Premier and Jiangxi and threatens to inform the Premier's wife of his unfaithfulness. The worried Premier announces that he Ep 25: 恩兰为了一次过除掉优彬和珊妮，指使优彬带着珊妮私奔，然后派人在优彬的车动手脚，让他们遇车祸。恩兰以为优彬和珊妮都逃不过一死，召开记者会数落他们的不是。优彬和珊妮却突然安然无恙地现身，揭发恩兰虚伪的真面目。Ep 26: 珊妮拍到首相和江熙在酒店里幽会的画面，警告首相不要轻举妄动，否则将首相和江熙的奸情告知首相夫人。害怕的首相隔天里克宣布重新调查昭贤皇后案，撤下李赫的职务，并宣布由李允接替执行皇帝的职务。.

programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 1

Like his predecessors, he might be released early should he win. 泰国中部一家青年改造所，利用泰拳改造囚犯；操行好、训练有术的拳手，能外出参赛赚钱，和家人见面。努力了7年，Charoenporn正为比赛备战；如果他连续夺冠、为监狱争光，就可能追随几位前辈，提前出狱。.

programme.title: Baba Papa The Series - EP 7
programme.desc: Liana is distrubed by the fact that Izzaty is constantly speaking English to her son Irfan. This results and Liana wanting to confront Izzaty so Lutfi and Latif have to think of ways to avoid this confrontation. Meanwhile, Latif feels the like age is catching up on him and he's physically not capable of bringing up a baby at his age.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat S2 - EP 4
